basics.name: Aleksander Trinh
basics.label: Data Analyst/Web Dev
basics.summary: My name is Aleksander and I am full stack developer that specializes in data centered applications and visualizations. I am experinced in data analysis and can use both ML/DL techniques to deliver valuable and comprehensible insights

work.summary: Promoted internally to more technical role but still maintaining client oriented approach. Now specializing in advanced analytics and web app development for financial sector. In charge of all DevOps related issues within the team.
As Data Analyst in S&O team was in charge of conducting extensive analyses on e-commerce and financial data as well as development of data based web application for banking sector
Bachelor's degree finished in 2017, Master's in 2020

education.institution: Korea Advanced Institute of Sciences and Technology(KAIST)

courses: Quantitative Methods in Economics and Information Systems

interests.name: Web App Development
keywords: I have commerical experience in building purposed web applications (using Vue.js and Python) that are optimized for desktop and smartphones. I am comfortable using Docker for development and production as well as I am used to deploying apps using Azure services (Azure Web Apps, AKS, ACI, Virtual Machines)

interests.name: Data analysis and analytics
keywords: I use various analysis techniques(eg. ML, customer, basket, spatial, leakage) to gain insights from any sort of data provided. Results, trends and recommendations are presented in clear manner.

interests.name: Dashboards and Infographics
keywords: Using PowerBI and Python I am able to show results in an interactive way in form of dashboard, where one can examine all the outcomes by himself. With the help of Adobe suite I can also create inspiring, animated infographics

interests.name: Process automation
keywords: I am able to write all sort of automated scripts that can gather data from different sources (eg. web scraping). I can also create data analysis pipelines for larger datasets using Azure.
